articles.title: Google's 'Ask for Me' feature calls businesses on your behalf to inquire about services, pricing - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is testing a new "Ask for Me" feature that uses AI to call local businesses on your behalf, for information about availability and pricing. The
articles.content: Google is testing a new “Ask for Me” feature that uses AI to call local businesses on your behalf, for information about availability and pricing. The feature is available on desktop and mobile for u… [+1631 chars]
